script: (doc['system.cpu.iowait.pct'].value/(doc['system.cpu.user.pct'].value + doc['system.cpu.nice.pct'].value + doc['system.cpu.system.pct'].value + doc['system.cpu.idle.pct'].value + doc['system.cpu.iowait.pct'].value + doc['system.cpu.irq.pct'].value + doc['system.cpu.softirq.pct'].value + doc['system.cpu.steal.pct'].value))*100
